submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, a: List[int], b: List[int]) -> int:
        res=0
        a.sort()
        b.sort()
        ua=ub=0
        while a and b:
            ca=(ub+1)*a[-1]
            cb=(ua+1)*b[-1]
            if a[-1]>b[-1]:
                res+=ca
                a.pop()
                ua+=1
            else:
                res+=cb
                b.pop()
                ub+=1
            #print(a,b,ca,cb)
        while a:
            ca=(ub+1)*a[-1]
            res+=ca
            a.pop()
            ua+=1
        while b:
            cb=(ua+1)*b[-1]
            res+=cb
            b.pop()
            ub+=1
        return res
